Overdraft Services

Every customer has unique financial needs, and at Westamerica, we provide options on how to manage your account based on your personal financial style. Responsible account management is important and diligently monitoring your checking account activity will allow you to keep track of your balance, identify unauthorized activity, and help you avoid overdrawing your account. You should make every effort to avoid overdrawing your account since our resulting fees and charges can be very expensive. By not overdrawing your account, you can avoid these fees.

Learn More

Trust Services

Increase your opportunity for asset growth

Westamerica Bank’s Investment Management and Trust Services Department offers quality trust services to administer, preserve and protect your assets. Our in-house trust officers have extensive experience in trust administration and investment management services. Services range from appointment as a custodial agent to full management as trustee of your assets. No matter which service you select, your financial affairs will be managed with the highest level of confidentiality and professionalism. Our Trust Department can be reached by calling (800) 359-7562, and will be pleased to provide you with more information.

Personal Trust Services

​Westamerica can act as an administrator, conservator, guardian, trustee, investment manager or agent, or as custodial agent. We administer probate, testamentary trusts, living trusts, charitable remainder trusts, and other types of trusts.
